import React, { Component } from "react"; import { List, ListItem, ListItemText } from "@material-ui/core/"; import TopBar from "./TopBar.js"; import { ThemeProvider as MuiThemeProvider } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import { withStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; const useStyles = (theme) => ({ formControl: { margin: theme.spacing(1), minWidth: 350, }, selectEmpty: { marginTop: theme.spacing(2), }, }); const ColorButton = withStyles((theme) => ({ root: { color: theme.palette.getContrastText("#859438"), backgroundColor: "#859438", "&:hover": { backgroundColor: "#859438", }, margin: theme.spacing(1), }, }))(Button); class Confirm extends Component { continue = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // PROCESS FORM // let data = JSON.stringify({ items: "this.state.formattedSchedule", firstName: this.values.firstName, lastName: this.values.lastName, email: "", sid: "", academicTitle: "", residency: "", major: "", majorWeight: "", gender: "", genderWeight: "", hobbies: [], availability: [], hopeToGain: "", planToMeet: "", occupation: "", city: "", bio: "", firstChoiceLearn: "", firstChoiceLearnOther: "", firstChoiceLearnLevel: "", secondChoiceLearn: "", secondChoiceLearnOther: "", secondChoiceLearnLevel: "", firstChoiceTeach: "", firstChoiceTeachOther: "", firstChoiceTeachLevel: "", secondChoiceTeach: "", secondChoiceTeachOther: "", secondChoiceTeachLevel: "", comments: "", }); console.log(data); this.props.nextStep(); }; back = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.prevStep(); }; render() { const { values: { firstName, lastName, email, sid, academicTitle, residency, major, majorWeight, gender, genderWeight, hobbies, availability, hopeToGain, planToMeet, firstChoiceLearn, firstChoiceLearnOther, firstChoiceLearnLevel, secondChoiceLearn, secondChoiceLearnOther, secondChoiceLearnLevel, firstChoiceTeach, firstChoiceTeachOther, firstChoiceTeachLevel, secondChoiceTeach, secondChoiceTeachOther, secondChoiceTeachLevel, comments, }, classes, } = this.props; return ( <>

Confirmation

Back Confirm & Continue ); } } export default withStyles(useStyles)(Confirm);
